message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $120 is a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that 100 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do 110 for the product. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $110, but I'm still looking to get the product for a bit less.  I'm willing to go to $105. If you're not able to do that, I'll have to look elsewhere.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to get the product for a bit less, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to 105. I can do 108 for the product, which is the best I can do. Let me know what you think.
